To install and start Ganache, you can follow these steps:

1. Download the installation package from the provided link.
2. Open the program, where you can view accounts, blocks, transactions, and logs.
3. Click on "Settings" to set the IP and port (set to 8545, which MetaMask will use later), account quantity, and gas limit. Click on "restart" for the settings to take effect.

After these steps, Ganache will be running a private Ethereum network on your local machine, binding to port 8545.
